message.content:
cs.CL, cs.SI, cs.CY, cs.SD, cs.CR 

The paper discusses the use of language in Computer Mediated Communication (CMC), which falls under the category of Natural Language Processing (NLP) and Computational Linguistics (CL). Hence, cs.CL is the most likely sub-category. The paper also discusses the impact of CMC on society, which falls under the category of Social and Information Networks (cs.SI). The paper also discusses the need to control the use of hostile and aggressive language, which falls under the category of Cybersecurity (cs.CR). The paper also discusses the classification of flames, which can be seen as a form of data analysis, which falls under the category of Cybernetics (cs.CY) and Software Engineering (cs.SD).
